entities.name: roberts family
entities.description: The Roberts family is mentioned as being larger than ever, with a presence that is causing difficulty for the Ministry wizards. (Excerpt: 'beneath the Roberts family was larg er than ever')

entities.name: ministry wizards
entities.description: The Ministry wizards are trying to navigate through the Roberts family's presence, but are having difficulty performing spells that might harm them. (Excerpt: 'the Ministry wizards trying to get th rough it to the hooded wizards in the center')

entities.name: hooded wizards
entities.description: The hooded wizards are mentioned as being in the center, and are the target of the Ministry wizards' efforts. (Excerpt: 'the hooded wizards in the center')

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as being injured, with Harry and Hermione searching for him. (Excerpt: 'Then he heard Ron yell with pain')

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as being anxious and trying to find Ron, using her wand to illuminate the path. (Excerpt: '“What happened?” said Hermio ne anxiously')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as being pushed around by people he can't see, and is searching for Ron. (Excerpt: 'Harry felt himself being pushed hither and thither by people whose faces he could not see')

relationships.description: The Ministry wizards are trying to navigate through the Roberts family's presence, but are having difficulty performing spells that might harm them. (Excerpt: 'the Ministry wizards trying to get th rough it to the hooded wizards in the center')
Hermione is searching for Ron, who has been injured. (Excerpt: '“What happened?” said Hermio ne anxiously, stopping so abruptly that Harry walked into her')
Harry is also searching for Ron, who has been injured. (Excerpt: 'Then he heard Ron yell with pain')
